docs.snippet: The NFL is abandoning St. Louis again, and this time, the mayor has no interest in trying to bring pro football back....
docs.lead_paragraph: The NFL is abandoning St. Louis again, and this time, the mayor has no interest in trying to bring pro football back.

headline.main: St. Louis Mayor: No Interest in Trying Again on NFL
headline.print_headline: St. Louis Mayor: No Interest in Trying Again on NFL

docs.snippet: With their move approved by the team owners, the Rams will give the Los Angeles area its first N.F.L. team since the Rams and the Raiders left in 1995. The Chargers have the option to join them as soon as next season....
docs.lead_paragraph: With their move approved by the team owners, the Rams will give the Los Angeles area its first N.F.L. team since the Rams and the Raiders left in 1995. The Chargers have the option to join them as soon as next season.
docs.abstract: St Louis Rams will return to Los Angeles after over two decades away, giving area its first NFL team since 1995; team plans to build $3 billion stadium in Inglewood, Calif; San Diego Chargers will have option to relocate to Los Angeles as well, in what would be unprecedented move of two NFL teams to same city in same year.

headline.main: Rams Moving to Los Angeles Area, and Chargers Could Join Them
headline.print_headline: With Rams, N.F.L. Replants Flag in Los Angeles

byline.contributor: Mark Leibovich contributed reporting from Houston, and Mike Tierney from Los Angeles.

docs.snippet: The favored in-flight pastime of a group of players including Al Horford, Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder is a schoolchildren’s card game with some added twists....
docs.lead_paragraph: The favored in-flight pastime of a group of players including Al Horford, Kent Bazemore and Dennis Schroder is a schoolchildren’s card game with some added twists.
docs.abstract: Several Atlanta Hawks teammates pass time traveling to games by playing modified version of card game Uno.

headline.main: For Some Atlanta Hawks, a Revved-Up Game of Uno Is Diversion No. 1
headline.print_headline: This Is the Flight Deck: Draw 4, Draw 2, Skip . . .
